modName: Kimonos Witcher Silver Sword ITA Unenchanted Standalone
summary: It adds one handed and two handed version of the Kimono\'s Witcher Silver Sword. I didn\'t like the backstept\'s standalone version so I made one by myself. It\'s completely forgeable and upgradable and it\'s enchantment free so you can enchant it yourself.
descriptionHtml:
It adds one handed and two handed version of the Kimono\'s Witcher Silver Sword. I didn\'t like the backstept\'s standalone version so I made one by myself. It\'s completely forgeable and upgradable and it\'s enchantment free so you can enchant it yourself. 
It has almost the same stats of a Daedric Sword (and Greatsword), just slightly weaker. 
The recipe is listed under Daedric and you can forge it even without the perk.
If you want to add them to the game just type this in your console:

help strigo 4

Strigo is the italian translation of Witcher. This code will show you all the items named with that word with their respective codes.

Credits goes to Kimono for his beautiful masterpiece.
author: vannixiii
